name: Danganronpa V4 Rocky Restarts
storyline: In the United States, a group of Ultimates travel to a summer camp for exceptional students.However they find out that it has been taken over by Monokuma and they are going to be forced into a Killing Game.
summary: Danganronpa V4 Rocky Restarts is a now cancelled cancelled Danganronpa fangame. The game had a prologue, one fully released chapter, and half of a second chapter prior to its cancellation.
